abstract: Novartis’s bid to buy out minority shareholders in Alcon does not fairly value their holdings, one of the largest investors in the eyecare group said.
snippet: Novartis’s bid to buy out minority shareholders in Alcon does not fairly value their holdings, one of the largest investors in the eyecare group said.
lead_paragraph: Novartis‘s bid to buy out minority shareholders in the eyecare company Alcon does not fairly value their holdings, one of the largest investors in Alcon said.

headline.main: Alcon Shareholders Push Novartis on Bid
